title: Merlier Pips Philipsen for Much-Needed Classics Win, Wiebes Makes it 4 in a Row at Scheldeprijs
content:
The Dutch star has won every edition since it was introduced in 2021, and Quick-Step snags overdue classics victory.

Read the full article at Merlier Pips Philipsen for Much-Needed Classics Win, Wiebes Makes it 4 in a Row at Scheldeprijs on Velo.
author: ahood
